projects.name: Supporting Migrant Health Data Collection and Management in Tourist Resorts​
projects.description: Supporting Migrant Health Data Collection and Management in Tourist Resorts​ - This project supports the Government of Maldives, particularly the Ministry of Health / Health Protection Agency, to upgrade and institutionalize gender-sensitive health data collection on migrant workers in the tourism sector. It maps existing health information systems (HIMS), develops and deploys a data-sharing platform aligned with data protection standards, and builds stakeholder coordination mechanisms and SOPs.
